name: Concealed Greatness
desc: Gloves with reality grabbing technology made possible by sensors in the exposed underlining.

name: Real Touch
desc: The standard edition. Pearls of reality-crossing transistors smatter a red glove.

name: Incognito Gloobers
desc: Small beads replace big pearls in this discreet edition.

name: Hidden Power Gloves
desc: One large sensor on each glove makes this pair functional and affordable.

name: Boxing Gloves
desc: Decorative outside replaced with insulation and a hard coating for durability.

name: Dragonkin Gloves
desc: Limited-time lucky Dragon-themed glove.

name: The Electro Force
desc: Electromagnetic field senses position of hands and fingers allowing for freer movement.

name: Diver's Choice
desc: Swimming on the other plane? Get in the pool for a more realistic simulation and bring your gloves too.

name: Dot Adapter
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 10 feet of range

name: Phone Jack Adapter 1
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 15 feet of range

name: Phone Jack Adapter 2
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 20 feet of range

name: Mouse Jack
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 25 feet of range

name: USB Jack 1
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 40 feet of range

name: USB Jack 2
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 55 feet of range

name: The Reality Wave
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 100 feet of range

name: The Reality Rift
desc: Receiver for reality grabber with 175 feet of range

name: Multi-Colored, Clear Curtains
desc: You're just trying out this VR thing, but it's too bright to see anything.

name: White Curtains
desc: Now it's dark enough to play.

name: Grey Curtains
desc: Those rays really come down in the summer.

name: Greyer Grey Curtains
desc: No more fooling around. You need it dim.

name: Greyest Gray Curtains
desc: Your soul is fading away. Grey is of the devel and you flock to it.

name: Black Curtains
desc: You are officially a shut-in.

name: Black Tape
desc: Tape down the curtains. The light burns!

name: Bricks and Mortar
desc: Vampire status achieved. The sun has started to burn, so windows are no longer necessary.
